title: Question:
author: AndreiGeep
content: What if we send (through governments) from Europe and New World all bad to Africa. It's like a big island and it will be hard for them to get out = perfect prison.(1st) We can start with black fags, criminals (any criminals from them), and who practice witch craft.(2nd) White fags and hard criminals (not for small stuff).(3rd) Maybe whites who practice witch craft too?(4th) Maybe even all devil, satanists, and object worshippers?Reason for not to keep them in your country jails is when circumstances change or a new president, they could let them out to continue there evil ways.Another reason is that it will be the best rehabilitation for them if they manage to survive.If we get enough people to agree and money, we can start a website and this will be the beginning of a cleanup. This may become a worldwide cleanup!!!Can donate for the cause in Bitcoins to address 1KT4gxjDBEzwZLVKcUV8pXRcbYYF1nD7Xw

comments.author: VKcams.com
comments.body: Those who are engaged in masturbation, where do you recommend that they be directed?

comments.author: Tellarmachine
comments.body: AndreiGeep, are you Africa? If your divine answer should become a resounding yes.Then, you are as black as your Africa. But, if, though, your answer should be a promising no.Be assured at the back of Africa like black, when cleaned is white.Yet, you cap as if prison bars, witchcraft, black monkeys, double tongue, white lies and holdalls are not every part of mankind's world we live in but Africa.

It's like a big island and it will be hard for them to get out = perfect prison.(1st) We can start with black fags, criminals (any criminals from them), and who practice witch craft.(2nd) White fags and hard criminals (not for small stuff).(3rd) Maybe whites who practice witch craft too?(4th) Maybe even all devil, satanists, and object worshippers?Reason for not to keep them in your country jails is when circumstances change or a new president, they could let them out to continue there evil ways.Another reason is that it will be the best rehabilitation for them if they manage to survive.If we get enough people to agree and money, we can start a website and this will be the beginning of a cleanup. This may become a worldwide cleanup!!!Can donate for the cause in Bitcoins to address 1KT4gxjDBEzwZLVKcUV8pXRcbYYF1nD7XwIn the time of Enoch in the Christian literature we were made to understand that God created such a place and put in chains angels that left their formal estate to have an affair with mankind. Physically because of the current system of the world we can not create such place to imprison bad people and things but God has already created such place and he promised to keep them forever and human beings that will also commit sin and do bad things will joined them too.
